data.message: Eminem has only had a few hits on all his albums artist sucker everyone in buying the the whole damn albumn! When only theres only a couple of tracks that are good and hit home with some listeners! True Eminem has some tracks that will be played forever! Everyone needs some D-12/ Eminem in their lives! I know i need his music every now and again just with every artist i listen to

replies.message: Man, that's just your opinion, which you're entitled to.  Just don't go statin' this weak shit like it's fact, cuz it's not, it's your opinion.  I own every studio album of his (I won't buy "Curtain Call") and I love so much of each album.  He is and always will be head & shoulders above anyone else.
Naw! He ain't !y won't u buy curtain call! I've heard some of his underground stuff which is better than some of his albumns! Tech n9ne is better the eminem!
N9ne? Who the hell is that? Does anyone besides you even know they exist? Eminem is the shit. You don't like him? Get off his page.
Eminem is the king but Tech is not a bad one you should check him. And Hopsin. Just because someone hasn't blown up doesn't mean they have nothing to offer. ☝🙂

I know who Tech N9ne is.  Eminem would probably say that Tech is better & I bet that Tech would say that Eminem is better.  For me, nobody touches Eminem on a technical & lyrical level.  The man bends the language to suit him and what he's rapping about at the time.

And I won't get Curtain Call because it's essentially a greatest hits cd with a few extra unreleased songs & some of my more fave Eminem songs aren't/weren't hits.
There's another eminem greatest hits cd wich is 2 discs but they forgot to add No Love with Lil Wayne
